title: path/filepath: Rel should not .. all the way to the root
body:
Rel("/x/y/z", "/x/a/b") should be and is "../../a/b"
but 
Rel("/x/y/z", "/a/b/c") should be just "/a/b/c".
Right now it is "../../../a/b/c/".  Dot-doting all
the way to the root is kind of silly.

Also the behavior should be documented.
